headline: Trailblazing a Development Environment for Workers
keywords: Cloudflare Workers, Wrangler, Developers, Internship Experience, Serverless
description: When I arrived at Cloudflare for an internship in the summer of 2018, I was taken on a tour, introduced to my mentor who took me out for coffee (shoutout to Preston), and given a quick whiteboard overview of how Cloudflare works.
